Lore: {"text": "Scares nearby mobs away! Must be reset after triggering.","color": "aqua"}
ShiftLore: {"text": "When mobs walk towards the Jack o' Lantern, they get scared and avoid the area.","color": "gold","italic": true}
{"text": "Jack o' Lanterns need to be reset after use and do not contribute towards your biodiversity score.","color": "gold","italic": true}
